channel.title: Error connecting to server - Problem with No-Ip?
channel.description:
Hey, i cant login on ma server cuz it says :"Error connecting to server". Idk how this is possible, cuz i changed every 0.0.0.0 and 127.0.0.1 into my No-Ip (epicpkclient.no-ip.biz) I changed it in files like : gui.java server.java client.java in the server and the client map.
Anybody help please!?
Thnx, Thijs.

item.title: Error connecting to server - Problem with No-Ip?
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

you have to connect from “localhost” or “0.0.0.0” or “127.0.0.1” any work everyone else has to connect using the no-ip one tho…

no-ip basically redirects any information sent to that adress to your ip address, as your already on your IP address it creates a loop and well your pc doesn’t like it ;(

EDIT: and what he said

Read full topic
